channel.title: Telecom on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Telecom on FinanClub

item.title: NOK
item.description: score:50 Chances: Nokia’s recent 5G patent agreement with Honor demonstrates the strength of its patent portfolio and its potential for generating licensing revenue. The company’s focus on driving leadership in cloud-native software and as-a-service delivery models shows its commitment to meeting the increasing demand for critical networks.

item.title: ERIC
item.description: score:19 Chances: Ericsson’s financial report for the fourth quarter 2024 will be published soon, which could potentially have a positive impact on the stock. The company is actively involved in 5G infrastructure, which is a positive catalyst for its growth. Recent partnerships and awards, such as winning the National Innovation Award, indicate positive developments for the company.
